subject: Baseball
Umpires
lead_paragraph: Mike Winters, the umpire who was involved in the argument that left a Padres outfielder with a season-ending knee injury, was suspended  for the rest of the regular season.
snippet: Mike Winters, the umpire who was involved in the argument that left a Padres outfielder with a season-ending knee injury, was suspended  for the rest of the regular season.
